modName: Short Mage Robes for Sundracon Male
summary: More freedom to wave your wand.
descriptionHtml:
If you\'re like me, you found the mage college a little stuffy. This will help.

You will need the Sundracon mod from Better Males: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488/

Contains two versions: a replacer and a craftable model which can be made with linen at the tanning rack.

The naming convention for these items is a little weird, so it could take some time to figure out which ones are which. The craftable version at least identifies them by color. The screen shots show the \"apprentice\" model -- there\'s also the green model and gold model, which may or may not be called \"college\" or \"mantled\" robes. Good luck.

I do not plan on making a Favored Soul version, but feel free to try your hand at it! :)

--Seedye
author: Seedye
